titles.title: A bill for the relief of Maria Manzano.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 3/3/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising out of improper disclosure of certain grievance proceeding records regarding a complaint against such individual (as supervisor) by an employee of the Laboratory Division of the Department of State.
